data.architecture:
**Clean Architecture for Goals Feature**

Follows the existing sharing feature architecture exactly:

**Data Layer:**
- Models: GoalModel, GoalMembershipModel, GoalProgressModel with Equatable, fromJson/toJson
- DataSource: GoalsRemoteDataSource with DioClient singleton, _GoalsEndpoints class
- Repository: GoalsRepositoryImpl with model-to-entity conversion helpers

**Domain Layer:**
- Entities: Goal, GoalMembership, GoalProgress - immutable with business logic methods
- Repository: GoalsRepository abstract interface
- UseCases: GetUserGoalsUseCase, CreateGoalUseCase, GetGoalProgressUseCase, GetGoalMembersUseCase, InviteUserUseCase

**Presentation Layer:**
- Provider: GoalsProvider extends ChangeNotifier with GoalsStatus enum, _updateState pattern
- Pages: GoalsListPage, GoalDetailPage, CreateGoalPage, InviteMembersPage
- Widgets: GoalCard, GoalProgressBar, MemberRankingList, GoalForm

**Routing:**
- Routes: /goals, /goals/:goalId, /goals/create, /goals/:goalId/invite
- Navigation via GoRouter with context.go()

**Setup Commands:**
```bash
flutter pub get
```

**Verification Commands:**
- Analyze: flutter analyze
- Test: flutter test
- Build: flutter build apk --debug

**API Endpoints (Backend Contract):**
- GET /goals - List user's goals
- POST /goals - Create new goal
- GET /goals/:id - Get goal details
- GET /goals/:id/progress - Get member progress rankings
- GET /goals/:id/members - Get goal members
- POST /goals/:id/invite - Invite user to goal
- PUT /goals/:id/invite/:inviteId/accept - Accept invitation
- PUT /goals/:id/invite/:inviteId/reject - Reject invitation

stories.title: Create Goal, GoalMembership, GoalProgress models in lib/features/goals/data/models/

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Extend Equatable for value equality
- Include fromJson factory and toJson method

üì¶ **GoalMembershipModel FIELDS:**

- username: String

üì¶ **GoalProgressModel FIELDS:**

- goalId: String
- userId: String
- username: String
- profileImageUrl: String?
- todaySteps: int
- totalSteps: int
- rank: int

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- No domain logic in models (keep in entities)

üß™ **VERIFICATION:**
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/data/models/
- Ensure all models have fromJson, toJson, copyWith, props

Given GoalMembershipModel instance, When toJson is called, Then valid JSON map is returned
Given GoalProgressModel, When copyWith is called with new rank, Then new instance has updated rank

stories.title: Create GoalsRemoteDataSource and GoalsRepository interface in lib/features/goals/
stories.description:
Create the datasource implementation and repository interface following sharing feature patterns.

üîí **SCOPE BOUNDARY:**
- You can ONLY create the 2 files listed below
- Follow exact patterns from sharing_remote_datasource.dart

üìÅ **FILES:**
- Read: lib/features/sharing/data/datasources/sharing_remote_datasource.dart, lib/core/network/dio_client.dart
- Create: lib/features/goals/data/datasources/goals_remote_datasource.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/repositories/goals_repository.dart

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Use DioClient singleton for HTTP requests
- Define local _GoalsEndpoints class for API paths
- Abstract interface + Impl class pattern

üì¶ **API ENDPOINTS (define in _GoalsEndpoints):**
- GET /goals - getUserGoals()
- POST /goals - createGoal(name, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate)
- GET /goals/:id - getGoalById(goalId)
- GET /goals/:id/progress - getGoalProgress(goalId)
- GET /goals/:id/members - getGoalMembers(goalId)
- POST /goals/:id/invite - inviteUser(goalId, userId)
- PUT /goals/:id/invite/:inviteId/accept - acceptInvite(goalId, inviteId)
- PUT /goals/:id/invite/:inviteId/reject - rejectInvite(goalId, inviteId)

üì¶ **GoalsRepository INTERFACE METHODS:**
- Future<List<Goal>> getUserGoals()
- Future<Goal> createGoal(String name, String? description, int targetSteps, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)
- Future<Goal> getGoalById(String goalId)
- Future<List<GoalProgress>> getGoalProgress(String goalId)
- Future<List<GoalMembership>> getGoalMembers(String goalId)
- Future<GoalMembership> inviteUser(String goalId, String userId)
- Future<void> acceptInvite(String goalId, String inviteId)
- Future<void> rejectInvite(String goalId, String inviteId)

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Don't hardcode base URL (use DioClient)
- Don't forget null checks on response.data

üß™ **VERIFICATION:**
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/data/datasources/
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/domain/repositories/
acceptanceCriteria: Given GoalsRemoteDataSourceImpl, When getUserGoals is called, Then DioClient.get('/goals') is invoked
Given GoalsRepository interface, When imported, Then all 8 method signatures are available
Given createGoal method, When called with params, Then POST request body includes all fields

stories.title: Create GoalsRepositoryImpl and use cases in lib/features/goals/
stories.description:
Create the repository implementation and all use case classes following sharing feature patterns.

üîí **SCOPE BOUNDARY:**
- Create repository impl + 5 use cases as listed below
- Follow SharingRepositoryImpl pattern for model-to-entity conversion

üìÅ **FILES:**
- Read: lib/features/sharing/data/repositories/sharing_repository_impl.dart, lib/features/sharing/presentation/providers/sharing_provider.dart (for usecase interface pattern)
- Create: lib/features/goals/data/repositories/goals_repository_impl.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/get_user_goals_usecase.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/create_goal_usecase.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/get_goal_progress_usecase.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/get_goal_members_usecase.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/invite_user_usecase.dart

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- GoalsRepositoryImpl takes GoalsRemoteDataSource in constructor
- Private helper methods for model-to-entity conversion: _goalModelToEntity, _membershipModelToEntity, _progressModelToEntity
- Each UseCase is abstract class with Future<T> call() method

üì¶ **GoalsRepositoryImpl:**
- Inject GoalsRemoteDataSource (default to GoalsRemoteDataSourceImpl())
- Implement all methods from GoalsRepository interface
- Convert models to entities using helper methods

üì¶ **USE CASES (abstract interfaces):**
1. GetUserGoalsUseCase: Future<List<Goal>> call()
2. CreateGoalUseCase: Future<Goal> call(String name, String? description, int targetSteps, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)
3. GetGoalProgressUseCase: Future<List<GoalProgress>> call(String goalId)
4. GetGoalMembersUseCase: Future<List<GoalMembership>> call(String goalId)
5. InviteUserUseCase: Future<GoalMembership> call(String goalId, String userId)

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Don't return models from repository (always convert to entities)
- Don't put business logic in repository (belongs in entities)

üß™ **VERIFICATION:**
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/data/repositories/
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/
acceptanceCriteria: Given GoalsRepositoryImpl.getUserGoals(), When called, Then returns List<Goal> entities (not models)
Given GetUserGoalsUseCase, When imported, Then has abstract call() method returning Future<List<Goal>>
Given GetGoalMembersUseCase, When call(goalId) is invoked, Then returns Future<List<GoalMembership>>

stories.title: Create GoalsProvider state management in lib/features/goals/presentation/providers/
stories.description:
Create GoalsProvider following the exact pattern from SharingProvider.

üîí **SCOPE BOUNDARY:**
- Create ONLY the goals_provider.dart file
- Follow SharingProvider pattern exactly: status enum, use cases injection, _updateState helper

üìÅ **FILES:**
- Read: lib/features/sharing/presentation/providers/sharing_provider.dart (CRITICAL - follow this pattern exactly)
- Create: lib/features/goals/presentation/providers/goals_provider.dart

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- GoalsStatus enum: initial, loading, loaded, error
- ChangeNotifier with _updateState helper method
- Inject all use cases via constructor
- Optimistic updates for user actions
- _parseError helper for user-friendly error messages

üì¶ **GoalsProvider STATE:**
- GoalsStatus _status
- List<Goal> _goals (user's goals)
- Goal? _activeGoal (currently selected goal)
- List<GoalProgress> _goalProgress (progress for active goal)
- List<GoalMembership> _goalMembers (members for active goal)
- String? _errorMessage
- bool _isCreating (for create goal loading state)

üì¶ **GoalsProvider GETTERS:**
- status, goals, activeGoal, goalProgress, goalMembers, errorMessage
- isLoading, isCreating, hasGoals, hasActiveGoal
- activeGoalMemberCount, activeGoalDaysRemaining

üì¶ **GoalsProvider METHODS:**
- loadUserGoals() - fetches all user goals
- selectGoal(String goalId) - sets active goal and loads progress/members
- createGoal(name, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate)
- inviteUser(String userId) - invites to active goal
- refreshActiveGoal() - reloads progress for active goal
- clearError()
- reset()

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Don't call notifyListeners() multiple times (use _updateState)
- Don't forget to set loading state before async operations

üß™ **VERIFICATION:**
- flutter analyze lib/features/goals/presentation/providers/
acceptanceCriteria: Given GoalsProvider, When loadUserGoals is called, Then status changes to loading then loaded
Given GoalsProvider with goals, When selectGoal is called, Then activeGoal is set and progress is loaded
Given GoalsProvider, When createGoal succeeds, Then new goal is added to goals list
